verses.verse: Now there was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7027>Kish<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H22>Abiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H9502>Zeror,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1064>Becorath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H647>Aphiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H376>Benjamite,<s%> <S%H3228><s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> a <S%H970>choice<s%> and <S%H2896>handsome<s%> [man,] and <S%H369>there<s%> was not a <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H2896><s%> <S%H2896>handsome<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> from his <S%H7926>shoulders<s%> and up he was <S%H1364>taller<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now the <S%H860>donkeys<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s father, were lost. So <S%H1>Kish<s%> <S%H6>said<s%> to his <S%H7027>son<s%> Saul, <S%H559>"Take<s%> <S%H1121>now<s%> with you <S%H3947>one<s%> of the <S%H4994>servants,<s%> and <S%H259>arise,<s%> <S%H5288>go<s%> <S%H6965>search<s%> for the <S%H1980>donkeys.<s%>"

And he <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8031>Shalishah,<s%> but they did not <S%H4672>find<s%> [them.] Then they <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8171>Shaalim,<s%> but [they were] not [there.] Then he <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1145>Benjamites,<s%> but they did not <S%H4672>find<s%> [them.]

When they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6689>Zuph,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was with him, <S%H1980>"Come,<s%> and let us <S%H7725>return,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> my father <S%H1>cease<s%> [to be concerned] <S%H2308>about<s%> the <S%H4480>donkeys<s%> and <S%H860>become<s%> <S%H1672>anxious<s%> for us."

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> there is a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H3513>held<s%> in <S%H3513>honor;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H1696>says<s%> <S%H935>surely<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> true. <S%H6258>Now<s%> let us <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> he can <S%H5046>tell<s%> us about our <S%H1870>journey<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> we have <S%H1980>set<s%> out."

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> "But <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if we <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall we <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%>? For the <S%H3899>bread<s%> is <S%H235>gone<s%> from our <S%H3627>sack<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8670>present<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> do we <S%H854>have<s%>?"

And the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H4672>have<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H7253>fourth<s%> of a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> [it] to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and he will <S%H5046>tell<s%> us our <S%H1870>way.<s%>"

<S%H6440>(Formerly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> he used to <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come,<s%> and let us <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H9536>seer<s%>"; for [he who is <S%H7121>called<s%>] a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3117>now<s%> was <S%H6440>formerly<s%> called a <S%H9536>seer.<s%>)

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H2896>"Well<s%> <S%H1697>said;<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> let us <S%H1980>go.<s%>" So they <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was.

As they <S%H5927>went<s%> up the <S%H4608>slope<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H5291>women<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Is the <S%H9536>seer<s%> <S%H2088>here<s%>?"

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> them and <S%H559>said,<s%> "He is; <S%H2009>see,<s%> [he is] <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of you. <S%H4116>Hurry<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> for he has <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> have a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"As soon as you <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> you will <S%H4672>find<s%> him <S%H2962>before<s%> he <S%H5927>goes<s%> up to the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> will not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>comes,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he must <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> those who are <S%H7121>invited<s%> will <S%H398>eat.<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H5927>go<s%> up for you will <S%H4672>find<s%> him at <S%H3117>once.<s%>"

So they <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H5892>city.<s%> As they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H3318>coming<s%> out <S%H7122>toward<s%> them to <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place.<s%>
Now a <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Saul's <S%H935>coming,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1540>revealed<s%> <S%H241><s%> [this] to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"About this <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him to be <S%H5057>prince<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he shall <S%H3467>deliver<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> For I have <S%H7200>regarded<s%> My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H6818>cry<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to Me."

When <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H559>spoke<s%> to you! <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> shall <S%H6113>rule<s%> over My <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5066>approached<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H335>where<s%> the seer's <S%H1004>house<s%> is."

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am the <S%H9536>seer.<s%> <S%H5927>Go<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> me to the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place,<s%> for you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> with me <S%H3117>today;<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> I will <S%H7971>let<s%> you <S%H7971>go,<s%> and will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> that is on your <S%H3824>mind.<s%>

"And as for your <S%H860>donkeys<s%> which were lost <S%H6>three<s%> <S%H7969>days<s%> <S%H3117>ago,<s%> do not <S%H3117>set<s%> your <S%H7760>mind<s%> on them, for they have been <S%H3820>found.<s%> And for <S%H4672>whom<s%> is <S%H4310>all<s%> that is <S%H3605>desirable<s%> in <S%H2532>Israel<s%>? Is it not for you and for <S%H3478>all<s%> your father's <S%H3605>household<s%>?"

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Am I not a <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> of the <S%H6996>smallest<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and my <S%H4940>family<s%> the <S%H6810>least<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>? <S%H4100>Why<s%> then do you <S%H1696>speak<s%> to me in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>way<s%>?"

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H5288>servant<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H3957>hall,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them a <S%H4725>place<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of those who were <S%H7121>invited,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> were about <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2876>cook,<s%> <S%H5414>"Bring<s%> the <S%H4490>portion<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you, concerning <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H7760>'Set<s%> it <S%H5973>aside.<s%>'"

Then the <S%H2876>cook<s%> <S%H7311>took<s%> up the <S%H7785>leg<s%> with what was on it and <S%H7760>set<s%> [it] <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%> And <S%H8050>[Samuel<s%>] <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> is what has been <S%H7604>reserved!<s%> <S%H7760>Set<s%> [it] <S%H6440>before<s%> you [and] <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it has been <S%H8104>kept<s%> for you until the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time,<s%> since I <S%H559>said<s%> I have <S%H7121>invited<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>" So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> with Samuel that <S%H3117>day.<s%>
When they <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> [Samuel] <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> on the <S%H1406>roof.<s%>

And they <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early;<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at <S%H7837>daybreak<s%> that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> on the <S%H1406>roof,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6965>"Get<s%> up, that I may <S%H7971>send<s%> you <S%H7971>away.<s%>" So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> he and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out into the <S%H2351>street.<s%>

As they were <S%H3381>going<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>"Say<s%> to the <S%H5288>servant<s%> that he might <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of us and <S%H5674>pass<s%> on, but you remain <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H3117>now,<s%> that I may <S%H8085>proclaim<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to you."
